name: Ace Basin Aviation
about: Ace Basin Aviation, located in Walterboro, South Carolina, is a specialized flight school dedicated to tailwheel aircraft training. Our hangar houses 12 tailwheel aircraft, with four owned by the school's founder, Todd Givens. We offer comprehensive training programs in stick and rudder flying, grass strip operations, low and slow flight techniques, and open cockpit flights powered by radial engines. Our experienced instructors provide Stearman flight training, ensuring students achieve proficiency. We also offer transition training and aircraft ferrying services. At Ace Basin Aviation, our goal is to provide high-quality instruction in a unique and challenging flying environment, ensuring our students are well-prepared and confident in their skills. We strive to maintain a safe and informative learning environment for all our pilots.
